articles.title: Euro zone Oct inflation confirmed at 4.1% y/y on energy spike - Reuters
articles.description: Euro zone inflation surged to more than twice the European Central Bank's target in October, the European Union's statistics office Eurostat confirmed on Wednesday, with more than half of the jump due to a spike in energy prices.
articles.content: The skyline is photographed early evening in Frankfurt, Germany, January 26, 2016. REUTERS/Kai Pfaffenbach/File PhotoBRUSSELS, Nov 17 (Reuters) - Euro zone inflation surged to more than twice the Eur… [+1660 chars]

articles.title: Pressure on takeaway chains as Domino's ditches 'fast chickens' - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: Domino's says fast food brands in New Zealand risk falling behind European standards for chicken welfare, as it moves to phase out controversial fast-growing breeds.

articles.title: Cristiano Ronaldo's Portugal could face Italy in World Cup playoff showdown - ESPN.co.uk
